description: This file defines the FeedbackEntity class, which maps to the 'feedback' database table. It models passenger feedback related to airport facilities or services, including fields like rating, message, status, timestamps, and associated passenger and facility IDs.

classes.name: FeedbackEntity
classes.description: Entity class representing feedback provided by passengers regarding airport facilities or services.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the feedback record.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the feedback record.

methods.name: getPassengerId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the passenger who submitted the feedback.

methods.name: setPassengerId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the passenger who submitted the feedback.

methods.name: getFacilityId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the facility related to the feedback.

methods.name: setFacilityId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the facility related to the feedback.

methods.name: getRating
methods.description: Returns the rating score given in the feedback.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when feedback was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when feedback was last updated.
